name: Kuma
short: A cog for responding to Uptime Kuma pings, which could be used for most uptime monitoring services.
description: A cog for responding to Uptime Kuma pings, which could be used for most uptime monitoring services.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg: This cog was created for a bounty and therefore comes with no support unless you are the requester.
author: Vexed
